description.english: First save deck after editing
description.schinese: 首次成功保存卡组

description.english: First get card from store
description.schinese: 首次商店抽卡成功

description.english: Lost in first battle with robot
description.schinese: 首次战斗就被人机击败

description.english: Defeat robot 1 time
description.schinese: 击败人机1次

description.english: Defeat robot 5 times
description.schinese: 击败人机5次

description.english: Defeat robot 10 times
description.schinese: 击败人机10次

description.english: First cause damage to gamer
description.schinese: 战斗中首次发生玩家掉血事件

description.english: Win with only 1 HEL
description.schinese: 仅剩1滴血情况下，获得战斗胜利

description.english: Win with full HEL
description.schinese: 满血情况下，获得战斗胜利

description.english: Match then fight with other gamer 1 time
description.schinese: 匹配一次真实玩家，并完成战斗

description.english: Enter battle with three or more same cards in your deck.
description.schinese: 进入战斗时，携带的卡组中有三张或以上的相同卡牌

description.english: Enter battle with only 1 hero in your deck.
description.schinese: 进入战斗时，携带的卡组中有且只有1个英雄

description.english: Enter battle with only 2 heroes in your deck.
description.schinese: 进入战斗时，携带的卡组中有且只有2个英雄

description.english: Enter battle without binding card in your deck.
description.schinese: 进入战斗时，携带的卡组中有英雄，但没有英雄绑定卡

description.english: Enter battle without equip card and servant card in your deck.
description.schinese: 进入战斗时，携带的卡组中没有装备卡和随从卡

description.english: Enter battle without tech card and servant card in your deck.
description.schinese: 进入战斗时，携带的卡组中没有科技卡和随从卡

description.english: Enter battle without tech card and equip card in your deck.
description.schinese: 进入战斗时，携带的卡组中没有科技卡和装备卡

description.english: Enter battle without servant higher than 4 Elec in your deck.
description.schinese: 进入战斗时，携带的卡组中没有高于4费的随从，法术卡

description.english: Enter battle without servant below 4 Elec in your deck.
description.schinese: 进入战斗时，携带的卡组中没有低于4费的随从，法术卡

description.english: Win 1 time by using only hero and binding card
description.schinese: 只使用过英雄卡和绑定卡完成1场战斗的胜利

description.english: Win 1 time by using only hero， binding card and tech card
description.schinese: 只使用过英雄卡和绑定卡，以及科技卡完成1场战斗的胜利

description.english: Win 1 time by using only hero， binding card and equip card
description.schinese: 只使用过英雄卡和绑定卡，以及装备卡完成1场战斗的胜利

description.english: Win 1 time by using only hero， binding card and servant card
description.schinese: 只使用过英雄卡和绑定卡，以及随从卡完成1场战斗的胜利

description.english: End battle in 5 rounds
description.schinese: 在5回合内结束战斗

description.english: End battle more than 10 rounds
description.schinese: 在10回合以上结束战斗

description.english: Win 1 time in Normal mode
description.schinese: 赢得一场标准模式的战斗

description.english: Win 1 time in Chaos mode
description.schinese: 赢得一场乱斗模式的战斗

description.schinese: 段位达到统世

description.schinese: 在战斗中同战区移动过6次以上并获得胜利
